title: [GAMEPLAY] Rek'Sai's burrows
body: Every noun again i'll be walking past Rek'Sai burrows and they tend to flash and look extremely buggy and when stood on the noise of the corroding burrow does not occur its just silent. I'm not sure if its a curtain place/s she puts them but it can be really off putting at times. Anyone else notice this?

replies.body:
Hey ZeroFrostX,

You're not the only one to notice this. My fiancé plays a lot of Rek'Sai, so I see this quite often. This is something we're aware of and are working on a fix. 

Thanks for the report!
